name: Test Case 2: Entry-Level Software Engineer
description: Test case for entry-level software engineer position with recent graduate background

input.resume_text: Recent computer science graduate with a passion for coding. Completed several projects using Python and JavaScript. Eager to learn and contribute to a fast-paced development team.
input.job_ad: We are looking for a motivated entry-level software engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in computer science and a desire to learn new technologies. Experience with Python or JavaScript is a plus.

suggested_experiences.suggestion: Develop a full-stack web application using Python and Django with user authentication
suggested_experiences.implementation: Create a portfolio website with blog functionality and user management

suggested_experiences.suggestion: Contribute to open-source projects on GitHub
suggested_experiences.implementation: Find beginner-friendly issues in popular Python/JavaScript projects

suggested_experiences.suggestion: Build projects that demonstrate full development lifecycle
suggested_experiences.implementation: Create applications with proper documentation, testing, and deployment

key_strengths: Strong motivation and eagerness to learn
